name: House of horror 2
description:
Are you a fan of find a way games? Then you will like the game House of Horrors 2.

      House of Horror 2 is the sequel and final installment of the browser-based psychological horror game House of Horror.

      House of Horror 2 is a 3D action and adventure game with beautiful graphics and great effects. In the game you are waiting for easy but interesting quests, as well as the popular theme of the genre to find a way out.
